paragraphs.content: Unto thee will I cry, O LORD my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Unto thee will I cry, O Lord my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.

paragraphs.content: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.

paragraphs.content: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.

paragraphs.content: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.

paragraphs.content: Because they regard not the works of the LORD, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because they regard not the works of the Lord, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.

paragraphs.content: Blessed be the LORD, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Blessed be the Lord, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.

paragraphs.content: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
